resources.string: Welcome to PurplePlay, an app that helps you easily watch movies and listen to music. In order to use the app, you will need to create an account. By creating an account and using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Data CollectionPurplePlay collects personal information from you in order to provide you with the best possible experience. This includes information such as your name, email address in order to make the process easier, as well as any other information you choose to provide.PurplePlay does not display any advertising to you.
Device AccesseConstat\n PurplePlay requires access to your device s camera in order to function properly. By using the app, you grant PurplePlay permission to access your device s camera.

Third-Party Integrations\nPurplePlay uses a Node.js server to store and process data. By using the app, you agree to the collection, use, and sharing of your data as described in these terms and conditions.

Changes to These Terms\nPurplePlay reserves the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. If we make any changes, we will post the revised terms and conditions on this page and will indicate the effective date of the revised terms and conditions. We encourage you to review these terms and conditions periodically to stay informed about our practices.
Contact UsIf you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at PurplePlay@esprit.tn
